thread.title: The only thing worse than Tom Brady's pick-6 was his tackle attempt
thread.title_full: The only thing worse than Tom Brady's pick-6 was his tackle attempt

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: The only thing worse than Tom Brady's pick-6 was his tackle attempt
text:
The only thing worse than Tom Brady's pick-6 was his tackle attempt Tom Brady threw a pick-6 and followed it with a flying missed tackle Post to Facebook The only thing worse than Tom Brady's pick-6 was his tackle attempt Tom Brady threw a pick-6 and followed it with a flying missed tackle  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/tom-brady-pick-6-missed-tackle-sad-new-england-patriots-atlanta-falcons-super-bowl-robert-alford-interception/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   The only thing worse than Tom Brady's pick-6 was his tackle attempt Chris Korman , USA TODAY Sports 8:19 p.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
HOUSTON, TX - FEBRUARY 05: Tom Brady #12 of the New England Patriots reacts after Robert Alford #23 of the Atlanta Falcons scored a touchdown during the second quarter of Super Bowl 51 at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images) ORG XMIT: 694911629 ORIG FILE ID: 633949140 (Photo: Patrick Smith, Getty Images) 
Tom Brady threw his first pick-six in seven Super Bowl appearances, and it gave Atlanta a commanding 21-0 lead near the end of the second quarter. 
It was a rare bad - awful, really - read by Brady, who either simply didn't seen Robert Alford or assumed Danny Amendola would run a more shallow route and cut the ball off. Either way, it left him charging over to try to make a tackle. 
And after a leaping attempt - a truly admirable attempt - he went skidding across the turf, having accomplished nothing. 
Here now, we gratuitously offer you every possible photo angle of this valiant failure. 
Here's the thing: Brady looks about 50 times more athletic there that he did at the combine when he came out of college ( something he claims is true ). He's 39. What a marvel. 
And also: If you've ever tried that hard at something in your life, take a moment to reflect. You are exceptional. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/tom-brady-pick-6-missed-tackle-sad-new-england-patriots-atlanta-falcons-super-bowl-robert-alford-interception/ Most Popular
